item.title: S.非洲移动公司 Cell C 在日交所首秀表现平平
item.description: 南非移动网络运营商 Cell C 控股有限公司（Cell C Holdings Ltd. ）在约翰内斯堡证券交易所（Johannesburg Stock Exchange）的首日开盘表现平平，非洲大陆的顶级证券交易所有望迎来自 2017 年以来首次公开募股募集资金最多的一年。【原文：South African mobile-network operator Cell C Holdings Ltd. opened flat in its debut on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange, with the continent’s top bourse on track for its best year for funds raised from initial public offerings since 2017.】

item.title: 摩根大通将在伦敦金丝雀码头新建英国总部
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）计划在伦敦金丝雀码头（Canary Wharf）建造一座新大厦，作为其在英国的总部，以加强其在金融中心的影响力。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. plans to build a new tower in London’s Canary Wharf for its headquarters in the UK, bolstering its presence in the financial hub.】

item.title: 股市和英镑保持稳定，因为投资者吸收了大量预算
item.description: 11 月 26 日，蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）在议会提交预算。资料来源：英国议会英国议会【原文：Rachel Reeves presents her budget in Parliament on Nov. 26. Source: UK Parliament】

item.title: 伊斯兰银行业回暖，新加坡皇家银行盈利创纪录
item.description: 马来西亚 RHB 银行（RHB Bank Bhd）公布了创纪录的季度收益，这主要得益于其伊斯兰银行部门的复苏和低于预期的信贷损失。【原文：Malaysia’s RHB Bank Bhd. posted record quarterly earnings, propelled by a recovery in its Islamic banking division and lower-than-expected credit losses.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）认为印度经济增长面临关税压力，而德里则希望达成协议
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）继续下调对印度下一财年经济增长的预期，理由是美国可能继续征收高额关税，尽管新德里表示降低关税的贸易协议即将达成。【原文：The International Monetary Fund has maintained its lowered projection for India’s growth next financial year, citing the possibility that high US tariffs could remain in place, even as New Delhi says a trade deal to reduce the levies is close.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴发布内置 "问问 "人工智能的夸克智能眼镜
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）开始销售由其 "问问 "人工智能模型驱动的首款智能眼镜，这标志着该公司罕见地进军消费硬件领域。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. began sales of its first smart glasses powered by its Qwen AI models, marking a rare foray into consumer hardware.】

item.title: 杰富瑞与华尔街同行携手推动沙特私人信贷发展
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc）首次进军沙特阿拉伯私人信贷领域，牵头为金融初创公司 Erad 完成了 1.25 亿美元的融资交易。【原文：Jefferies Financial Group Inc. is making its first foray into Saudi Arabia’s private credit space, leading a $125 million financing deal for finance startup Erad.】

item.title: 印度卢比如何成为今年亚洲最差货币
item.description: 印度卢比目前是 2025 年表现最差的亚洲货币。这一年，俄罗斯入侵乌克兰使油价飙升至每桶 100 美元以上，对进口约 90% 原油的印度造成了重大打击。【原文：The Indian rupee is currently Asia’s worst-performing currency of 2025. It is also on track for its largest annual decline since 2022 — the year Russia’s invasion of Ukraine sent oil prices soaring past $100 per barrel, dealing a major blow to India, which imports about 90% of its crude.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利收盘看涨英镑，预算案利好将消失
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）关闭了其看涨英镑的建议，指出英镑很可能已经迎来了其最后的短期积极催化剂。【原文：Morgan Stanley has closed its bullish pound recommendation, noting the currency is likely to have seen its last near-term positive catalyst.】

item.title: 加密货币交易所 Upbit 在完成 103 亿美元交易后遭遇漏洞攻击
item.description: 韩国最大的加密货币交易所 Upbit 周四暂停了存款和取款服务，因为约 3700 万美元的数字资产被未经授权转移到了一个外部钱包。【原文：Upbit, South Korea’s largest crypto exchange, suspended deposit and withdrawal services on Thursday after an unauthorized transfer of about $37 million in digital assets to an external wallet.】

item.title: 软银 CDS 扩大，乐天缩小，信用观点出现分歧
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp. ）的信用违约掉期攀升至 4 月份以来的最高水平，原因是在全球竞争加剧之际，投资者对这家科技巨头以债务推动增长的做法持谨慎态度。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp.’s credit-default swaps climbed to the highest level since April, as investors turned cautious on the tech behemoth’s debt-fueled growth at a time of intensifying global competition.】

item.title: 特斯拉高管表示，选择供应商要看质量而非国别
item.description: 特斯拉公司的一位高管表示，这家电动汽车制造商评估供应商的依据是技术优势而非地理位置，在地缘政治紧张局势加剧导致全球贸易复杂化之际，他强调了该公司与中国制造商的紧密合作关系。【原文：A senior Tesla Inc. executive said the electric vehicle maker evaluates suppliers based on technical merit rather than geography, highlighting the company’s close partnerships with Chinese manufacturers at a time when heightened geopolitical tensions are complicating global trade.】

item.title: 中国政府推动经济增长后，大众超市引领中国消费反弹
item.description: 在中国政府宣布刺激消费的新措施后，大众超市国际集团股份有限公司的股价创下三个月来最大涨幅，引领中国消费类股广泛反弹。【原文：Pop Mart International Group Ltd. shares jumped the most in three months, leading a broad rally in China’s consumer stocks after Beijing announced new measures to boost spending.】

item.title: 香港多年来最致命大火内幕："太可怕了
item.description: 在一个阳光明媚的星期三下午 2 点 51 分左右，人们首次发现火焰爬上了竹脚手架和绿色网罩，网罩将位于香港东北部的 31 层楼高的宏昌大厦包裹了起来。【原文：It was around 2:51 p.m on a sunny Wednesday afternoon when flames were first spotted climbing up the bamboo scaffolding and green netting that encased the 31-story Wang Cheong House in northeastern Hong Kong.】

item.title: 中国太平保险因香港火灾亡人事故责任下降
item.description: 中国太平保险控股有限公司股价周四下跌，原因是该保险公司在香港一个与一场致命火灾有关的建筑项目中存在风险敞口。【原文：China Taiping Insurance Holdings Co. shares dropped Thursday due to the insurer’s exposure to a Hong Kong construction project tied to a deadly fire.】

item.title: 日本央行鸽派成员暂缓增加 12 月加息押注
item.description: 日本央行鸽派董事会成员野口旭（Asahi Noguchi）对 12 月加息持中性立场，强调了在适当时机采取行动的重要性，从而避免给市场日益增长的猜测火上浇油。【原文：The Bank of Japan’s dovish board member Asahi Noguchi refrained from adding fuel to growing market speculation over a December rate hike by broadly taking a neutral stance, stressing the importance of acting at the right time.】

item.title: 中国液化天然气需求看来又要失望一年了
item.description: 由于令人失望的工业需求和持续走高的全球价格，中国的液化天然气进口有可能在今年再次陷入疲软。【原文：Chinese liquefied natural gas imports are at risk of another weak year as disappointing industrial demand and persistently high global prices look set to reduce purchases.】

item.title: 澳大利亚资本支出因数据中心和飞机而创下 2021 年以来最大增幅
item.description: 澳大利亚的商业投资出现了自 2021 年初以来的最大增幅，这主要得益于数据中心和飞机方面的大笔支出。【原文：Australian business investment posted its biggest increase since early 2021, driven by major outlays on data centers and aircraft — a welcome boost for an economy that has been struggling to generate momentum.】

item.title: 日本避谈特朗普是否要求不要挑衅中国
item.description: 有报道称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普曾建议日本首相佐那江隆一不要在台湾问题上挑衅中国，日本政府最高发言人对此避而不谈。【原文：Japan’s top government spokesperson refrained from directly addressing whether US President Donald Trump advised Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi not to provoke China over Taiwan, following a report suggesting such an exchange took place.】

item.title: 澳大利亚可能考虑提前加息，因为经济已接近速度极限
item.description: 澳大利亚国民银行（National Australia Bank Ltd.）首席经济学家莎莉-奥尔德（Sally Auld）表示，如果经济增长加快、劳动力市场收紧，澳大利亚央行最早可能需要在 2026 年上半年加息。【原文：Australia’s central bank may need to raise interest rates as early as the first half of 2026 if economic growth quickens and the labor market tightens, according to Sally Auld, chief economist at National Australia Bank Ltd.】

item.title: 印度成为世界上最平静的股市之一
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 新西兰央行行长霍克斯比称进一步降息的门槛很高
item.description: 新西兰央行行长克里斯蒂安-霍克斯比（Christian Hawkesby）表示，目前进一步降息的门槛很高，这强化了宽松周期可能已经结束的信号。【原文：New Zealand central bank governor Christian Hawkesby said there is now a high hurdle for further interest-rate cuts, reinforcing the signal that the easing cycle has likely come to an end.】

item.title: 增长困境加剧，中国工业利润再度下滑
item.description: 中国工业企业的盈利三个月来首次出现下降，进一步证明这个世界第二大经济体正在失去动力。【原文：China’s industrial enterprises saw their earnings drop for the first time in three months, adding to evidence that the world’s second-largest economy is losing steam.】

item.title: 新西兰企业乐观情绪创 11 年新高，显示经济复苏迹象
item.description: 澳新银行（ANZ Bank）的一项调查显示，11月份新西兰企业对贸易前景的乐观情绪飙升至11年来的最高点，这进一步表明经济正在复苏。【原文：Optimism among New Zealand firms about their trading prospects surged to an 11-year high in November, an ANZ Bank survey showed, adding to signs that an economic recovery is under way.】

item.title: DeepSeek 竞争对手的中国支持者巨石公司融资 2.89 亿美元
item.description: 支持 DeepSeek 竞争对手 MoonShot AI 的巨石管理公司（Monolith Management）已经筹集了约 2.89 亿美元，它正寻求在该国的人工智能领域投资更多公司。【原文：Monolith Management, which backed DeepSeek-rival MoonShot AI, has raised about $289 million as it seeks to invest in more companies in the country’s artificial intelligence space.】

item.title: 金融风险持续，增长保持强劲，韩国央行维持利率不变
item.description: 韩国央行维持基准利率不变，此举受到广泛期待，因为强劲的经济增长使当局有余地继续关注确保房地产市场的反弹不会引发金融动荡。【原文：South Korea’s central bank left its benchmark rate unchanged in a widely-expected move, as robust economic growth gives authorities room to keep their focus on ensuring that a housing-market rally doesn’t trigger financial instability.】

item.title: 日元反弹可能是亚洲新兴市场落后者韩元反弹的关键
item.description: 日元持续升值可能对韩元有利，韩元是本季度亚洲新兴货币中表现最差的货币，近二十年来，韩元和日元的走势最为接近。【原文：A sustained yen appreciation is likely to bode well for the South Korean won, emerging Asia’s worst-performing currency this quarter, with moves between the two most closely in sync in nearly two decades.】

item.title: 印度 Motilal 计划成立高达 3.36 亿美元的私人信贷基金
item.description: 印度 Motilal Oswal Alternate Investment Advisors Pvt Ltd. 已向印度证券交易委员会提出申请，为其首家私人信贷基金募集多达 300 亿卢比（3.36 亿美元）的资金。【原文：India’s Motilal Oswal Alternate Investment Advisors Pvt Ltd. has applied to the Securities and Exchange Board of India to raise as much as 30 billion rupees ($336 million) for its maiden private credit fund.】

item.title: 交易员权衡美国降息前景，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 由于市场对美国再次降息的预期不断升温，黄金价格在上一交易日上涨近 1%，但随后趋于稳定。【原文：Gold steadied, having gained nearly 1% in the previous session on growing expectations of another interest-rate cut in the US.】

item.title: 交易商关注乌克兰谈判和欧佩克+，石油走低
item.description: 投资者追踪美国领导的结束乌克兰战争的努力，同时展望本周末的欧佩克+会议，石油走低。【原文：Oil edged lower as investors tracked US-led efforts to end the war in Ukraine, while looking ahead to an OPEC+ gathering this weekend.】
